verses.verse: וַיְהִ֥י <S%H1961><s%> came דְבַר־ <S%H1697><s%> And the word יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD אֵלַ֥י <S%H413><s%> to me לֵאמֹֽר׃ <S%H559><s%> came unto me saying

בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> Son אָדָ֕ם <S%H120><s%> of man שִׂ֥ים <S%H7760><s%> set פָּנֶ֖יךָ <S%H6440><s%> thy face אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> toward הָרֵ֣י <S%H2022><s%> toward the mountains יִשְׂרָאֵ֑ל <S%H3478><s%> of Israel וְהִנָּבֵ֖א <S%H5012><s%> and prophesy אֲלֵיהֶֽם׃ <S%H413><s%> against

וְאָ֣מַרְתָּ֔ <S%H559><s%> And say הָרֵי֙ <S%H2022><s%> Ye mountains יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <S%H3478><s%> of Israel שִׁמְע֖וּ <S%H8085><s%> hear דְּבַר־ <S%H1697><s%> the word אֲדֹנָ֣י <S%H136><s%> of the Lord יְהוִ֑ה <S%H3069><s%> GOD כֹּה־ <S%H3541><s%> Thus אָמַ֣ר <S%H559><s%> Thus saith אֲדֹנָ֣י <S%H136><s%> the Lord יְ֠הוִה <S%H3069><s%> GOD לֶהָרִ֨ים <S%H2022><s%> to the mountains וְלַגְּבָע֜וֹת <S%H1389><s%> and to the hills לָאֲפִיקִ֣ים <S%H650><s%> to the rivers [וְלַגֵּאָיֹת כ] (וְלַגֵּאָיֹ֗ות <S%H1516><s%> valley ק) הִנְנִ֨י <S%H2009><s%> Behold אֲנִ֜י <S%H589><s%> Myself מֵבִ֤יא <S%H935><s%> Behold I [even] I will bring עֲלֵיכֶם֙ <S%H5921><s%> and חֶ֔רֶב <S%H2719><s%> a sword וְאִבַּדְתִּ֖י <S%H6><s%> upon you and I will destroy בָּמֽוֹתֵיכֶֽם׃ <S%H1116><s%> your high places

וְנָשַׁ֙מּוּ֙ <S%H8074><s%> shall be desolate מִזְבְּח֣וֹתֵיכֶ֔ם <S%H4196><s%> And your altars וְנִשְׁבְּר֖וּ <S%H7665><s%> shall be broken חַמָּֽנֵיכֶ֑ם <S%H2553><s%> and your images וְהִפַּלְתִּי֙ <S%H5307><s%> and I will cast down חַלְלֵיכֶ֔ם <S%H2491><s%> your slain לִפְנֵ֖י <S%H6440><s%> [men] before גִּלּוּלֵיכֶֽם׃ <S%H1544><s%> your idols

וְנָתַתִּ֗י <S%H5414><s%> And I will lay אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> פִּגְרֵי֙ <S%H6297><s%> the dead carcases בְּנֵ֣י <S%H1121><s%> of the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <S%H3478><s%> of Israel לִפְנֵ֖י <S%H6440><s%> before גִּלּֽוּלֵיהֶ֑ם <S%H1544><s%> their idols וְזֵרִיתִי֙ <S%H2219><s%> and I will scatter אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> עַצְמ֣וֹתֵיכֶ֔ם <S%H6106><s%> your bones סְבִיב֖וֹת <S%H5439><s%> round about מִזְבְּחוֹתֵיכֶֽם׃ <S%H4196><s%> your altars

בְּכֹל֙ <S%H3605><s%> all מוֹשְׁב֣וֹתֵיכֶ֔ם <S%H4186><s%> In all your dwellingplaces הֶעָרִ֣ים <S%H5892><s%> the cities תֶּחֱרַ֔בְנָה <S%H2717><s%> shall be laid waste וְהַבָּמ֖וֹת <S%H1116><s%> and the high places תִּישָׁ֑מְנָה <S%H3456><s%> shall be desolate לְמַעַן֩ <S%H4616><s%> because of יֶחֶרְב֨וּ <S%H2717><s%> may be laid waste וְיֶאְשְׁמ֜וּ <S%H816><s%> and made desolate מִזְבְּחֽוֹתֵיכֶ֗ם <S%H4196><s%> that your altars וְנִשְׁבְּר֤וּ <S%H7665><s%> may be broken וְנִשְׁבְּתוּ֙ <S%H7673><s%> and cease גִּלּ֣וּלֵיכֶ֔ם <S%H1544><s%> and your idols וְנִגְדְּעוּ֙ <S%H1438><s%> may be cut down חַמָּ֣נֵיכֶ֔ם <S%H2553><s%> and your images וְנִמְח֖וּ <S%H4229><s%> may be abolished מַעֲשֵׂיכֶֽם׃ <S%H4639><s%> and your works

וְנָפַ֥ל <S%H5307><s%> shall fall חָלָ֖ל <S%H2491><s%> And the slain בְּתֽוֹכְכֶ֑ם <S%H8432><s%> in the midst וִֽידַעְתֶּ֖ם <S%H3045><s%> of you and ye shall know כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> that אֲנִ֥י <S%H589><s%> I am יְהוָֽה׃ <S%H3068><s%> that I [am] the LORD

וְהוֹתַרְתִּ֗י <S%H3498><s%> Yet will I leave a remnant בִּהְי֥וֹת <S%H1961><s%> will have לָכֶ֛ם פְּלִ֥יטֵי <S%H6412><s%> that ye may have [some] that shall escape חֶ֖רֶב <S%H2719><s%> the sword בַּגּוֹיִ֑ם <S%H1471><s%> among the nations בְּהִזָּרֽוֹתֵיכֶ֖ם <S%H2219><s%> when ye shall be scattered בָּאֲרָצֽוֹת׃ <S%H776><s%> through the countries

וְזָכְר֨וּ <S%H2142><s%> of you shall remember פְלִֽיטֵיכֶ֜ם <S%H6412><s%> And they that escape אוֹתִ֗י <S%H853><s%> בַּגּוֹיִם֮ <S%H1471><s%> me among the nations אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> to which נִשְׁבּוּ־ <S%H7617><s%> whither they shall be carried captives שָׁם֒ <S%H8033><s%> in it אֲשֶׁ֨ר <S%H834><s%> how נִשְׁבַּ֜רְתִּי <S%H7665><s%> because I am broken אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> לִבָּ֣ם <S%H3820><s%> heart הַזּוֹנֶ֗ה <S%H2181><s%> with their whorish אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> which סָר֙ <S%H5493><s%> which hath departed מֵֽעָלַ֔י <S%H5921><s%> and וְאֵת֙ <S%H854><s%> and by עֵֽינֵיהֶ֔ם <S%H5869><s%> from me and with their eyes הַזֹּנ֕וֹת <S%H2181><s%> which go a whoring אַחֲרֵ֖י <S%H310><s%> after גִּלּֽוּלֵיהֶ֑ם <S%H1544><s%> their idols וְנָקֹ֙טּוּ֙ <S%H6962><s%> and they shall lothe בִּפְנֵיהֶ֔ם <S%H6440><s%> themselves אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> for הָֽרָעוֹת֙ <S%H7451><s%> for the evils אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> which עָשׂ֔וּ <S%H6213><s%> which they have committed לְכֹ֖ל <S%H3605><s%> for all תּוֹעֲבֹתֵיהֶֽם׃ <S%H8441><s%> in all their abominations

וְיָדְע֖וּ <S%H3045><s%> And they shall know כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> that אֲנִ֣י <S%H589><s%> I am יְהוָ֑ה <S%H3068><s%> that I [am] the LORD לֹ֤א <S%H3808><s%> not אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> in חִנָּם֙ <S%H2600><s%> in vain דִּבַּ֔רְתִּי <S%H1696><s%> [and that] I have not said לַעֲשׂ֥וֹת <S%H6213><s%> that I would do לָהֶ֖ם הָרָעָ֥ה <S%H7451><s%> this evil הַזֹּֽאת׃ <S%H2063><s%> likewise פ

כֹּֽה־ <S%H3541><s%> Thus אָמַ֞ר <S%H559><s%> Thus saith אֲדֹנָ֣י <S%H136><s%> the Lord יְהוִ֗ה <S%H3068><s%> GOD הַכֵּ֨ה <S%H5221><s%> Smite בְכַפְּךָ֜ <S%H3709><s%> with thine hand וּרְקַ֤ע <S%H7554><s%> and stamp בְּרַגְלְךָ֙ <S%H7272><s%> with thy foot וֶֽאֱמָר־ <S%H559><s%> and say אָ֔ח <S%H253><s%> Alas אֶ֛ל <S%H413><s%> because כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> of all תּוֹעֲב֥וֹת <S%H8441><s%> abominations רָע֖וֹת <S%H7451><s%> for all the evil בֵּ֣ית <S%H1004><s%> of the house יִשְׂרָאֵ֑ל <S%H3478><s%> of Israel אֲשֶׁ֗ר <S%H834><s%> which בַּחֶ֛רֶב <S%H2719><s%> by the sword בָּרָעָ֥ב <S%H7458><s%> by the famine וּבַדֶּ֖בֶר <S%H1698><s%> and by the pestilence יִפֹּֽלוּ׃ <S%H5307><s%> for they shall fall

הָרָח֞וֹק <S%H7350><s%> He that is far off בַּדֶּ֣בֶר <S%H1698><s%> of the pestilence יָמ֗וּת <S%H4191><s%> shall die וְהַקָּרוֹב֙ <S%H7138><s%> and he that is near בַּחֶ֣רֶב <S%H2719><s%> by the sword יִפּ֔וֹל <S%H5307><s%> shall fall וְהַנִּשְׁאָר֙ <S%H7604><s%> and he that remaineth וְהַנָּצ֔וּר <S%H5341><s%> and is besieged בָּרָעָ֖ב <S%H7458><s%> by the famine יָמ֑וּת <S%H4191><s%> shall die וְכִלֵּיתִ֥י <S%H3615><s%> thus will I accomplish חֲמָתִ֖י <S%H2534><s%> my fury בָּֽם׃

וִֽידַעְתֶּם֙ <S%H3045><s%> Then shall ye know כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> that אֲנִ֣י <S%H589><s%> I am יְהוָ֔ה <S%H3068><s%> that I [am] the LORD בִּֽהְי֣וֹת <S%H1961><s%> become חַלְלֵיהֶ֗ם <S%H2491><s%> when their slain בְּתוֹךְ֙ <S%H8432><s%> [men] shall be among גִּלּ֣וּלֵיהֶ֔ם <S%H1544><s%> their idols סְבִיב֖וֹת <S%H5439><s%> round about מִזְבְּחֽוֹתֵיהֶ֑ם <S%H4196><s%> their altars אֶל֩ <S%H413><s%> on כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> every גִּבְעָ֨ה <S%H1389><s%> hill רָמָ֜ה <S%H7311><s%> upon every high בְּכֹ֣ל ׀ <S%H3605><s%> all רָאשֵׁ֣י <S%H7218><s%> in all the tops הֶהָרִ֗ים <S%H2022><s%> of the mountains וְתַ֨חַת <S%H8478><s%> under כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> every עֵ֤ץ <S%H6086><s%> tree רַֽעֲנָן֙ <S%H7488><s%> and under every green וְתַ֙חַת֙ <S%H8478><s%> and under כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> every אֵלָ֣ה <S%H424><s%> oak עֲבֻתָּ֔ה <S%H5687><s%> and under every thick מְק֗וֹם <S%H4725><s%> the place אֲשֶׁ֤ר <S%H834><s%> they נָֽתְנוּ־ <S%H5414><s%> where they did offer שָׁם֙ <S%H8033><s%> in it רֵ֣יחַ <S%H7381><s%> savour נִיחֹ֔חַ <S%H5207><s%> sweet לְכֹ֖ל <S%H3605><s%> to all גִּלּוּלֵיהֶֽם׃ <S%H1544><s%> to all their idols

וְנָטִ֤יתִי <S%H5186><s%> So will I stretch out אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> יָדִי֙ <S%H3027><s%> my hand עֲלֵיהֶ֔ם <S%H5921><s%> against וְנָתַתִּ֨י <S%H5414><s%> upon them and make אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הָאָ֜רֶץ <S%H776><s%> the land שְׁמָמָ֤ה <S%H8077><s%> desolate וּמְשַׁמָּה֙ <S%H4923><s%> yea more desolate מִמִּדְבַּ֣ר <S%H4057><s%> than the wilderness דִּבְלָ֔תָה <S%H1689><s%> toward Diblath בְּכֹ֖ל <S%H3605><s%> all מוֹשְׁבֽוֹתֵיהֶ֑ם <S%H4186><s%> in all their habitations וְיָדְע֖וּ <S%H3045><s%> and they shall know כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> that אֲנִ֥י <S%H589><s%> I am יְהוָֽה׃ <S%H3068><s%> that I [am] the LORD פ
